description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows libarchive remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-20696):

1. Apply the necessary KB updates for your version of Windows based on the provided build numbers.
2. Restart your system to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- Update packages for various Windows versions address the vulnerability effectively. Refer to the URLs below for manual downloads.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system is running one of the affected Windows builds.
- Backup critical data before applying updates.

**Update Packages**:
- KB5034121: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121)
- KB5034123: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
- KB5034130: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034130)
- KB5034127: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034127)
- KB5034122: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
- KB5034129: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034129)
